alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:46PM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Bighorn Canyon, Southern Big Horn, and Southern Rosebud. * WHEN...From 2 AM Wednesday to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Snow will likely cause slick roads and areas of poor visibility. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes, as well as the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold temperatures will accompany the snow. Wind chills will drop into the teens below zero Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
